attr.title: Vikings of Midgard
attr.desc: After the Aesir Gods defeated the Jotun and reshaped the world, a hidden evil crept in through the cracks of their victory. Now chaos spreads once more -- will you rise to face it? A retro-inspired RPG built with the OHRRPGCE engine, blending modern mechanics with Super Nintendo-era style.
attr.inst: All files included and ready to run. Thanks to Fenrir-Lunaris for releasing this fantastic game to the Public Domain.
attr.inst_md: All files included and ready to run. Thanks to [Fenrir-Lunaris](https://fenrir-lunaris.itch.io/vikings-of-midgard) for releasing this fantastic game to the Public Domain.
